channel.title: Need help on dementhium
channel.description: how do i add respawn on dementhium cuz if i use <respawn>10</respawn> gives errors when i run server Tried Autospawn, SpawnDelay. Spawn Delay doesnt give errors but it doesnt delay the spawn it dies and respawns again wich doesnt let people pickup the drop wich is gonna kill the economy so help me pleaese i dont want a spawn pk server im making a drop pk server

item.title: Need help on dementhium

item.description:
@david2471 wrote:

how do i add respawn on dementhium cuz if i use 10
gives errors when i run server
Tried Autospawn, SpawnDelay. Spawn Delay doesnt give errors but it doesnt delay the spawn it dies and respawns again
wich doesnt let people pickup the drop wich is gonna kill the economy so help me pleaese i dont want a spawn pk server im making a drop pk server
